title: AI Study Starter: What to Learn First
excerpt: A simple path to begin learning AI without getting overwhelmed.
html: Start with Python basics, then linear algebra, and move into practical projects like classification and sentiment analysis. Use free datasets, and build mini-projects before jumping to deep learning.

title: A 20-Minute Motivation Routine
excerpt: Daily micro-habits to stay consistent and positive.
html: Try the 5-5-10 rule: five minutes to plan, five to reflect, and ten for a quick learning sprint. Track wins in a simple note daily.
